## ADSROpts interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ADSROpts 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [a](./dsp.adsropts.a.md) | <code>number</code> | Attack time (in samples). Default: 0 |
|  [acurve](./dsp.adsropts.acurve.md) | <code>number</code> | Attack curvature. Recommended range \[0.0001 .. 10000\] (curved -<!-- -->&gt; linear). Default: 0.1 |
|  [d](./dsp.adsropts.d.md) | <code>number</code> | Decay time (in samples). Default: 0 |
|  [dcurve](./dsp.adsropts.dcurve.md) | <code>number</code> | Decay &amp; release curvature. Recommended range \[0.0001 .. 10000\] (curved -<!-- -->&gt; linear). Default: 0.1 |
|  [gain](./dsp.adsropts.gain.md) | <code>number</code> | Overall envelope gain / multiplier. Default: 1 |
|  [r](./dsp.adsropts.r.md) | <code>number</code> | Release time (in samples). Default: 0 |
|  [s](./dsp.adsropts.s.md) | <code>number</code> | Sustain level/gain (in \[0..1\] range). Default: 1 |
|  [slen](./dsp.adsropts.slen.md) | <code>number</code> | Sustain phase duration (in samples). Default: Infinity. If a finite value, then release phase is triggered automatically, else needs to be triggered manually via [ADSR.release()](./dsp.adsr.release.md)<!-- -->. |
